'''Fowler''' is a private firefighter who worked briefly with Robert Sullivan.

==History==
He and Sullivan held a training for convicts who were learning to fight wildfires. Fowler disliked this work, treating the convicts as lesser humans. He also knew of Sullivan's history and disparaged him for that as well.

While they were training the convict crew, they got a call related to a fire at a rest stop and left to take the call. They passed the fire and ended up at a very nice house, where they simply waited to protect the house in case the fire approached. As he heard that the fire was getting worse, Sullivan jumped in the truck and took it back to the fire, leaving Fowler on his own. When he came back, Sullivan expressed his disappointment in the system they were working for and said he was fine being fired.

==Career==
He is a private firefighter for Mavis Private Client Fire Protection.
